alert.note: Alert for Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 5:24AM CDT until May 07 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Douglas, Ozark, Taney and Wright. * WHEN...Until 530 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 524 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mountain Grove, Gainesville, Norwood, Hartville, Bakersfield, Dawson, Theodosia and Pontiac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
